about_the_game:
Includes the following DLC packs:

Intensity! Hyper Weapon Pack 6: Includes Meow Meow Punch, Paw Gloves, Rainbow Vest, Smiley Badge G.

Elegance! Hyper Weapon Pack 7: Includes Airhead Tree, Injection, Queen’s Garter, Queen’s Manicure Set.

Beauty! Hyper Weapon Pack 8: Includes Golden King Mallet, Comedy Hammer, Kingly Backpack, Sun Goddess Medal.

Initiative! Hyper Weapon Pack 9: Includes Knifey Fork, Banana Bratwurst, Dragon Chain, Cool Chick’s Book.

Cacophony! Hyper Weapon Pack 10: Includes Green Onion Blade, Capturing Hook, 100-Ton Badge.

* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.
* Certain clothing/armour items must have specific Peon Job Titles unlocked in order to appear.
* Certain items require other items to be owned before they will appear in the shop.
